title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Avatar Instructor Utilization Strategies for Mobile-Based Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more complex grammar rules with 80% accuracy under the guidance of an avatar instructor.
Learners reduce unnecessary cognitive load by 20% during avatar interactions, thereby improving learning concentration.
Learners engage in self-directed learning three or more times per week using avatar-based microcontent in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
